name: Reserveout, Ltd.
description: Operator of a restaurant and table management platform designed to bridge the gap between hospitality, entertainment, and dining service providers. The company allows users to search, view, and immediately reserve restaurants through a number of online channels, enabling restaurants and hotels to efficiently manage, track and sell resources and services available within their business.
one_liner: Operator of a restaurant and table management platform designed to bridge the gap between hospitality, entertainment, and dining service providers. The company allows users to search, view, and immediately reserve restaurants through a number of online channels, enabling restaurants and hotels to efficiently manage, track and sell resources and services available within their business.
